titles.title: To nullify the Supplemental Treaty Between the United States of America and the Confederated Tribes and Bands of Indians of Middle Oregon, concluded on November 15, 1865.
To nullify the Supplemental Treaty Between the United States of America and the Confederated Tribes and Bands of Indians of Middle Oregon, concluded on November 15, 1865.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Natural Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee for Indigenous Peoples of the United States.

committee.subcommittee: Indigenous Peoples of the United States
committee.name: House Natural Resources

bill.summary: This bill nullifies the supplemental treaty between the United States and the Confederated Tribes and Bands of Indians of Middle Oregon. Among other things, the treaty restricted the rights of tribal members to leave the reservation.
